```{r}

aucval = as.numeric(unlist(str_extract_all(aucranks, "[0-9]{2,3}")))
aucval
accval = as.numeric(unlist(str_extract_all(accranks, "[0-9]{2,3}")))
accval

aucname = gsub("[0-9]{2,3}", "", aucranks)
aucname = str_extract_all(aucname, "[:alnum:]+")
aucname
accname = gsub("[0-9]{2,3}", "", accranks)
accname = str_extract_all(accname, "[:alnum:]+")
accname

aucDF = data.frame(aucname, aucval)
colnames(aucDF) <- c("Method", "AucVal")
head(aucDF)

accDF = data.frame(accname, accval)
colnames(accDF) <- c("Method", "AccVal")
head(accDF)


df = inner_join(aucDF, accDF, by=c("Method"="Method"))
df$lincomb <- 0.4*df$AccVal + 0.6*df$AucVal
df[order(-df$lincomb),]
```
